body_html:
Updated the requested information below,

OS Platform & distribution - CentOS - 7.2.1511
Exact command to reproduce -

1- Command to run ps job - python ./DTF_train_image_classifier.py
--pipeline_id='TestPipeline_9'
--logs_dir=./log_dtf
--tf_records_dir=/home/mapr/mano/slim_data/flowers
--dataset_name=flowers
--num_classes=5
--training_num_epochs=1
--training_batch_size=32
--eval_num_epochs=1
--eval_batch_size=32
--checkpoint_path=hdfs://172.26.32.32:8020/user/mapr/deepak/inception_v3/inception_v3.ckpt
--checkpoint_exclude_scopes=InceptionV3/Logits,InceptionV3/AuxLogits
--steps_update_frequency=2
--job_name="ps"
--task_index=0

2- Command to run worker 0 task- python ./DTF_train_image_classifier.py
--pipeline_id='TestPipeline_9'
--logs_dir=./log_dtf
--tf_records_dir=/home/mapr/mano/slim_data/flowers
--dataset_name=flowers
--num_classes=5
--training_num_epochs=1
--training_batch_size=32
--eval_num_epochs=1
--eval_batch_size=32
--checkpoint_path=hdfs://ip1:8020/user/mapr/deepak/inception_v3/inception_v3.ckpt
--checkpoint_exclude_scopes=InceptionV3/Logits,InceptionV3/AuxLogits
--steps_update_frequency=2
--job_name="worker"
--task_index=0

2- Command to run worker 1 task - python ./DTF_train_image_classifier.py
--pipeline_id='TestPipeline_9'
--logs_dir=./log_dtf
--tf_records_dir=/home/mapr/mano/slim_data/flowers/slim_data_dir
--dataset_name=flowers
--num_classes=5
--training_num_epochs=1
--training_batch_size=32
--eval_num_epochs=1
--eval_batch_size=5
--checkpoint_path=hdfs://ip2:8020/user/mapr/deepak/inception_v3/inception_v3.ckpt
--checkpoint_exclude_scopes=InceptionV3/Logits,InceptionV3/AuxLogits
--steps_update_frequency=2
--job_name="worker"
--task_index=1

body:
Updated the requested information below,

OS Platform & distribution - CentOS - 7.2.1511
Exact command to reproduce - 

1- Command to run ps job - python ./DTF_train_image_classifier.py \
--pipeline_id='TestPipeline_9' \
--logs_dir=./log_dtf \
--tf_records_dir=/home/mapr/mano/slim_data/flowers \
--dataset_name=flowers \
--num_classes=5 \
--training_num_epochs=1 \
--training_batch_size=32 \
--eval_num_epochs=1 \
--eval_batch_size=32 \
--checkpoint_path=hdfs://172.26.32.32:8020/user/mapr/deepak/inception_v3/inception_v3.ckpt \
--checkpoint_exclude_scopes=InceptionV3/Logits,InceptionV3/AuxLogits \
--steps_update_frequency=2 \
--job_name="ps" \
--task_index=0

2- Command to run worker 0 task- python ./DTF_train_image_classifier.py \
--pipeline_id='TestPipeline_9' \
--logs_dir=./log_dtf \
--tf_records_dir=/home/mapr/mano/slim_data/flowers \
--dataset_name=flowers \
--num_classes=5 \
--training_num_epochs=1 \
--training_batch_size=32 \
--eval_num_epochs=1 \
--eval_batch_size=32 \
--checkpoint_path=hdfs://ip1:8020/user/mapr/deepak/inception_v3/inception_v3.ckpt \
--checkpoint_exclude_scopes=InceptionV3/Logits,InceptionV3/AuxLogits \
--steps_update_frequency=2 \
--job_name="worker" \
--task_index=0

2- Command to run worker 1  task -  python ./DTF_train_image_classifier.py \
--pipeline_id='TestPipeline_9' \
--logs_dir=./log_dtf \
--tf_records_dir=/home/mapr/mano/slim_data/flowers/slim_data_dir \
--dataset_name=flowers \
--num_classes=5 \
--training_num_epochs=1 \
--training_batch_size=32 \
--eval_num_epochs=1 \
--eval_batch_size=5 \
--checkpoint_path=hdfs://ip2:8020/user/mapr/deepak/inception_v3/inception_v3.ckpt \
--checkpoint_exclude_scopes=InceptionV3/Logits,InceptionV3/AuxLogits \
--steps_update_frequency=2 \
--job_name="worker" \
--task_index=1
